dt-example.title: Basic StateRestore Example - API
dt-example.info:
This example demonstrates all of the API methods that are available within StateRestore and how they can be used outside of the usual buttons interactions.
Use the input element to the right to input an identifier. The other buttons will then implement the relevant API methods.
<input id="state-selector"></input> <button id="save">Save</button> <button id="add">Add State</button> <button id="load">Load</button> <button id="remove">Remove</button> <button id="removeSkip">Remove and skip modal</button> <button id="removeAll">Remove All</button> <button id="removeAllSkip">Remove All skipping modal</button>
